GameDBLocalizedString.Text: ผู้เชี่ยวชาญเทคโนโลยี
พนักงานออฟฟิศ
พนักงานโรงเรียน
นักกายกรรม
เจ้านายที่ดี
Improves satisfaction of supervised colleagues every morning.
เรียนรู้ได้เร็ว
สามารถปรับระดับทักษะได้เร็วขึ้น
All needs are reduced much slower.
นักวิชาการ
Reveals hidden perks of people after interacting with them.
พักผ่อนได้เร็วขึ้น
เรียนรู้ได้ช้า
Long drive from home. Can often be late for work.
Will often show up late and hungover.
Very dirty shoes. Leaves dirt everywhere.
20% bonus experience to diagnoses skill, after successful diagnosis.
Washes hands three times to be sure.
Does not cause discomfort during examinations.
Works much more efficiently during the day.
Works much more efficiently during the night.
Gives "nice staff" modifier after interacting with patient.
Gives "mean staff" modifier after interacting with patient.
Very clean shoes. Does not make the floor dirty.
Does not take free time breaks.
Takes 20% less salary when leveling up.
Spends twice as much time enjoying food.
Is likely to reveal delicate symptoms.
Does not speak native language. Slower communication.
Is likely to hide delicate symptoms
Employees need to take a break a couple of times every day.\n\nIf rest level drops below two stars, it will start to negatively affect the performance of the employee.

Employees need to have access to water and food and ideally will eat a proper lunch in common room every day.\n\nIf hunger level drops below two stars, it will start to negatively affect the performance of the employee.
Patients need to have access to water or a snack if they're waiting long.
Restrooms should be available on every floor.
The level of pain and discomfort caused by symptoms, examinations and treatments.
The overall satisfaction influenced by needs, other people and environment.
